title: Metric | Fanatasies Typeface
content:
Hello everyone.

I need to know what the "Fantasies" Typeface is on this album cover.

Throw in the band names font too if you know it, please.

but, mainly I am trying to find the Fantasies part.

Thanks a lot!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730225353im_/http:/typophile.com/files/metriccover_4505.jpg)
author: andy_ab11

comments.content: The other one´s [Elephant Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730225353/http:/www.t26.com/search?q=elephant) by Gareth Hague.
